title: Area Volume: region bound by 2 functions of x part - c

content.description: Let R be the shaded region in the first quadrant enclosed by the y-axis and the graphs of y = 1 - x3 and y = sin(x2), as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the line y = -3.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the line y = -3.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
